def_en: Eternity is time without an end or a state of existence outside time, especially the state which some people believe they will pass into after they have died.

def_cn: 极长的一段时间;似乎无穷尽的一段时间
def_en: If you say that a situation lasted for an eternity, you mean that it seemed to last an extremely long time, usually because it was boring or unpleasant.
